<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17836](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17836.html) (build: Fix --with-gui configure option without argument by hebasto)
* [#15706](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15706.html) (build: Check QT library version by lucayepa)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

The related @theuni's [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11222#discussion_r142265041):
> ... we define QT_STATICPLUGIN elsewhere. Let's just delete this.

Two related PRs are combined into this one: #17836 and #17837.

The title and OP have been updated.
